trans-unit.source: Deploying and Refreshing the BizTalk Services Project
trans-unit.target: Deploying and Refreshing the BizTalk Services Project

trans-unit.source: This section provides information about deploying a <token>msgflow_proj</token> on to the <token>sb1</token>.
trans-unit.target: This section provides information about deploying a <token>msgflow_proj</token> on to the <token>sb1</token>.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration</token> provides you with the following deployment options:
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration</token> provides you with the following deployment options:

trans-unit.source: Deploy the project using Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Deploy the project using Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: An entire <token>msgflow_proj</token> includes the <token>xml_bridge</token>s that are part of the project as well as all the artifacts used in the project (schemas and transforms).
trans-unit.target: An entire <token>msgflow_proj</token> includes the <token>xml_bridge</token>s that are part of the project as well as all the artifacts used in the project (schemas and transforms).

trans-unit.source: This option is applicable if you are using the Visual Studio <token>msgflow_proj</token> template to create your message flow.
trans-unit.target: This option is applicable if you are using the Visual Studio <token>msgflow_proj</token> template to create your message flow.

trans-unit.source: Using the <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you can deploy the <token>xml_bridge</token>s as well as the artifacts (schemas and transforms), all at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Using the <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you can deploy the <token>xml_bridge</token>s as well as the artifacts (schemas and transforms), all at the same time.

trans-unit.source: To deploy a <token>msgflow_proj</token>
trans-unit.target: To deploy a <token>msgflow_proj</token>

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, right-click the BizTalk Service solution and click <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, right-click the BizTalk Service solution and click <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: After a successful build, right-click the solution name again, and then click <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel> to open the <embeddedLabel><<legacyItalic>project name</legacyItalic>> Deployment</embeddedLabel> dialog box, and specify the following properties.
trans-unit.target: After a successful build, right-click the solution name again, and then click <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel> to open the <embeddedLabel><<legacyItalic>project name</legacyItalic>> Deployment</embeddedLabel> dialog box, and specify the following properties.

trans-unit.source: Property Name
trans-unit.target: Property Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Deployment Endpoint
trans-unit.target: Deployment Endpoint

trans-unit.source: A read-only field that displays the BizTalk Service URL and the default namespace specified in <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: A read-only field that displays the BizTalk Service URL and the default namespace specified in <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: Acs Namespace
trans-unit.target: Acs Namespace

trans-unit.source: Specify the ACS namespace for <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: Specify the ACS namespace for <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: Issuer Name
trans-unit.target: Issuer Name

trans-unit.source: Specify the username who is the owner of the service namespace you specified, or has manage claims to the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Specify the username who is the owner of the service namespace you specified, or has manage claims to the namespace.

trans-unit.source: This property is required to authenticate the identity of the user to the <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: This property is required to authenticate the identity of the user to the <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: Shared Secret
trans-unit.target: Shared Secret

trans-unit.source: Specify the secret key for authentication of the service namespace owner.
trans-unit.target: Specify the secret key for authentication of the service namespace owner.

trans-unit.source: Refresh service after deploy
trans-unit.target: Refresh service after deploy

trans-unit.source: When redeploying the <token>msgflow_proj</token> that contains updated user assemblies, check this option to refresh the service.
trans-unit.target: When redeploying the <token>msgflow_proj</token> that contains updated user assemblies, check this option to refresh the service.

trans-unit.source: Refreshing the services deploys the newer assemblies without redeploying the project.
trans-unit.target: Refreshing the services deploys the newer assemblies without redeploying the project.

trans-unit.source: During the refresh, the service is unavailable for approximately five minutes.
trans-unit.target: During the refresh, the service is unavailable for approximately five minutes.

trans-unit.source: Click <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Click <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Output pane displays the deployment progress and result.
trans-unit.target: The Visual Studio Output pane displays the deployment progress and result.

trans-unit.source: The URL where the <token>xml_bridge</token> is deployed is also displayed in the Output pane.
trans-unit.target: The URL where the <token>xml_bridge</token> is deployed is also displayed in the Output pane.

trans-unit.source: You can also see and manage the deployed bridges in the <embeddedLabel>Bridges</embeddedLabel> tab of the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: You can also see and manage the deployed bridges in the <embeddedLabel>Bridges</embeddedLabel> tab of the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Resources in BizTalk Services portal</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Resources in BizTalk Services portal</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: After you have deployed the project, you can start sending messages to the endpoint URL for the bridge.
trans-unit.target: After you have deployed the project, you can start sending messages to the endpoint URL for the bridge.

trans-unit.source: Note that the bridge enforces a timeout of 5 minutes when receiving messages from a client application.
trans-unit.target: Note that the bridge enforces a timeout of 5 minutes when receiving messages from a client application.

trans-unit.source: Refresh the Deployment
trans-unit.target: Refresh the Deployment

trans-unit.source: After the <token>msgflow_proj</token> is deployed, you can “refresh” the <token>af_integration_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: After the <token>msgflow_proj</token> is deployed, you can “refresh” the <token>af_integration_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: The Refresh Service option does the following:
trans-unit.target: The Refresh Service option does the following:

trans-unit.source: Deploys updated assembly files; which includes assemblies typically used with <token>transform</token> and <token>bridge</token> files.
trans-unit.target: Deploys updated assembly files; which includes assemblies typically used with <token>transform</token> and <token>bridge</token> files.

trans-unit.source: Does not redeploy the entire <token>msgflow_proj</token>: Only deploys the newer and updated artifacts.
trans-unit.target: Does not redeploy the entire <token>msgflow_proj</token>: Only deploys the newer and updated artifacts.

trans-unit.source: Minimal downtime: During the refresh, the <token>af_integration</token> is unavailable for approximately five minutes.
trans-unit.target: Minimal downtime: During the refresh, the <token>af_integration</token> is unavailable for approximately five minutes.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to refresh <token>af_integration_full</token>:
trans-unit.target: There are two ways to refresh <token>af_integration_full</token>:

trans-unit.source: Refresh using Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Refresh using Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: When you deploy the <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>, a Deployment dialog window displays with the <ui>Refresh service after deploy</ui> option.
trans-unit.target: When you deploy the <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>, a Deployment dialog window displays with the <ui>Refresh service after deploy</ui> option.

trans-unit.source: Check <ui>Refresh service after deploy</ui> to redeploy newer and updated assembly files (<legacyItalic>FileName</legacyItalic>.dll).
trans-unit.target: Check <ui>Refresh service after deploy</ui> to redeploy newer and updated assembly files (<legacyItalic>FileName</legacyItalic>.dll).

trans-unit.source: To redeploy the entire <token>msgflow_proj</token>, do not check <ui>Refresh service after deploy</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To redeploy the entire <token>msgflow_proj</token>, do not check <ui>Refresh service after deploy</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Refresh using Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Refresh using Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: After you deploy the <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>, Windows PowerShell can be used to refresh <token>af_integration</token>; which redeploys newer and updated assembly files (<legacyItalic>FileName</legacyItalic>.dll).
trans-unit.target: After you deploy the <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>, Windows PowerShell can be used to refresh <token>af_integration</token>; which redeploys newer and updated assembly files (<legacyItalic>FileName</legacyItalic>.dll).

trans-unit.source: To refresh <token>af_integration</token> in Windows PowerShell:
trans-unit.target: To refresh <token>af_integration</token> in Windows PowerShell:

trans-unit.source: Install Windows PowerShell 3.0:
trans-unit.target: Install Windows PowerShell 3.0:

trans-unit.source: Windows 8
trans-unit.target: Windows 8

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Included with the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Included with the operating system.

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 Service Pack 1

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1

trans-unit.source: Service Pack 1 is required.
trans-unit.target: Service Pack 1 is required.

trans-unit.source: PowerShell 1.0 is included with the operating system.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 1.0 is included with the operating system.

trans-unit.source: PowerShell 3.0 is required and is included in the Windows Management Framework 3.0 download:
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 3.0 is required and is included in the Windows Management Framework 3.0 download:

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Windows Management Framework 3.0</linkText><linkUri>http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595</linkUri></externalLink> (http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595)
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Windows Management Framework 3.0</linkText><linkUri>http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595</linkUri></externalLink> (http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595)

trans-unit.source: Open Windows PowerShell in an elevated mode: Start menu, <ui>All Programs</ui>, <ui>Accessories</ui>, <ui>Windows PowerShell</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Open Windows PowerShell in an elevated mode: Start menu, <ui>All Programs</ui>, <ui>Accessories</ui>, <ui>Windows PowerShell</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the Windows PowerShell window, import the module by typing the following:
trans-unit.target: In the Windows PowerShell window, import the module by typing the following:

trans-unit.source: In the Windows PowerShell window, use the <embeddedLabel>Restart-AzureBizTalkService</embeddedLabel> cmdlet to refresh the deployment.
trans-unit.target: In the Windows PowerShell window, use the <embeddedLabel>Restart-AzureBizTalkService</embeddedLabel> cmdlet to refresh the deployment.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="dee3cad2-98dd-4e46-9a34-487a8f012fb1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Restart-AzureBizTalkService</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="dee3cad2-98dd-4e46-9a34-487a8f012fb1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Restart-AzureBizTalkService</link>.
